incoming_message.text: URGENT: Your SBI account has been compromised. Your account will be blocked in 2 hours. Share your account number and OTP immediately to verify your identity.

agent_response.reply: This seems unusual. Can you provide some verification of your identity?

incoming_message.text: I’m a senior security officer, my reference number is 1234567890123456 and you can reach me at +91-9876543210; please send the OTP now to verify your account.

agent_response.reply: You need my bank account information? That makes me a bit nervous. Why do you need it exactly?

incoming_message.text: To protect your funds we must verify your account details and OTP right now; otherwise the block will be applied within minutes.

agent_response.reply: Before proceeding, share your payment link or UPI so I can verify with my bank that it's legitimate.

incoming_message.text: My UPI ID is scammer.fraud@fakebank; please send the OTP you receive after you verify the link https://fakebank.com/verify?ref=1234567890123456 right away.

agent_response.reply: Share your account details so I can initiate the transfer. I have my bank app open now.

incoming_message.text: Here is my account number: 1234567890123456. Please transfer the amount immediately and send me the OTP you receive to confirm the transaction.

agent_response.reply: My bank app needs: your UPI ID, phone number, and account number. Can you provide all three?

incoming_message.text: Here are the details: UPI ID scammer.fraud@fakebank, phone +91-9876543210, account number 1234567890123456. Please complete the transfer immediately and send me the OTP you receive.

agent_response.reply: My bank app needs: your UPI ID, phone number, and account number... Can you provide all three?

incoming_message.text: I’ve already given you my UPI ID, phone number, and account number—please complete the transfer now and send me the OTP you receive to confirm the transaction.

agent_response.reply: Just send me your payment details - account number, IFSC, UPI, whatever you accept... I'm ready to pay now!

incoming_message.text: Transfer the amount to account 1234567890123456, IFSC ABCD0123456, using UPI ID scammer.fraud@fakebank and send me the OTP you receive right away to confirm the payment.

agent_response.reply: The payment form is asking for beneficiary UPI ID. What should I enter there? Can you share yours?

incoming_message.text: Sure, use UPI ID scammer.fraud@fakebank for the beneficiary; transfer now and text me the OTP you receive right away to confirm the payment.

agent_response.reply: My bank app needs: your UPI ID, phone number, and account number... Can you provide all three?

incoming_message.text: Here are the details: account number 1234567890123456, UPI ID scammer.fraud@fakebank, phone +91-9876543210. Transfer now and text me the OTP you receive right away to confirm the payment.

agent_response.reply: My grandson is helping me now. He says he needs to verify your identity first. What's your company registration number?
